text.section: In Part V of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Affiliate" means:
Each partner of a partnership;
Each officer, director, and stockholder who has direct or indirect ownership or control of 10 percent or more of the stock of a corporation; or
Each individual who has direct or indirect ownership of 10 percent or more of a nursing home or community program.
"Individual" means a person who is a resident of a nursing home or a community residential program or a person enrolled in a day habilitation or vocational program.
"Nursing home" means a related institution that is classified as a nursing home.
